title: Create Your Note
content: Create secure one-time self-destructing notes to send confidential information to someone you can't send it to email or messengers.

title: Base 64 Converter
content: This is a convienent online tool that allows you to convert to and from base64 data. You can encode and decode text, images, spreadsheets, documents - you name it.

title: Whats My Info
content: The easiest way to find your IP address, browser information, etc.

title: Mint Your Solana NFT
content: This web tool will allow you to mine Solana NFT tokens in a few clicks
